verses.name: 1 Kings 14:1
verses.text: At that time Abijah the son of Jeroboam fell sick.

verses.name: 1 Kings 14:2
verses.text: And Jeroboam said to his wife, Arise, I pray thee, and disguise thyself, that thou be not known to be the wife of Jeroboam; and get thee to Shiloh: behold, there is Ahijah the prophet, which told me that I should be king over this people.

verses.name: 1 Kings 14:3
verses.text: And take with thee ten loaves, and cracknels, and a cruse of honey, and go to him: he shall tell thee what shall become of the child.
